    • Uses of BetFairView in views

      Subclasses of BetFairView in views 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AnalysisView
      This class is used to provide a view of the predicted events and state of the game.
      class  GameSelectView
      GameSelectView is used to display the list of available games for the given sport thats in the received ProgramOptions object
      class  LoginView
      This class represents the users log in view to the program
      class  MarketSelectView
      This class is used to display the available markets for selection with the given options
      class  SportSelectView
      This class is used to provide users with the list of available sports that they can observe
      class  TestFileSelectionView
      Basic view for locating test files and then proceeding to simulate the program on them
